articles.description: Scientists have developed a new vaccine candidate against Covid-19 based on the yellow fever vaccine, a single dose of which protects hamsters and monkeys from infection with the SARS-CoV-2 coronavirus. The researchers at the Rega Institute at KU Leuven in Be…

articles.author: Angelo Amante, Gavin Jones
articles.title: Italy's health minister hopes first COVID-19 vaccines can start in January - Reuters
articles.description: Italians will not be able to attend midnight mass or move between regions over the Christmas period, a top health ministry official said on Wednesday, as the country battles high coronavirus infection rates and deaths.

articles.author: Reuters Staff
articles.title: Interpol warns that COVID-19 vaccines could be targeted by criminals - Reuters
articles.description: The Interpol global police co-ordination agency warned on Wednesday that organised criminal networks could be targeting COVID-19 vaccines, and could look to sell fake shots.
articles.content:
